name: Great vessels
definition:
The great vessels (T4 in Lung) are:
1. Aorta
2. Superior vena cava
3. Inferior vena cava
4. Main pulmonary artery (pulmonary trunk)
5. Intrapericardial portions of the right and left pulmonary artery
6. Intrapericardial portions of the superior and inferior right and left pulmonary veins

Invasion of more distal branches does not quality for classification as T4.
